name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (eVilLaitinen)
description:
2-4 players (Battle) 1-2 players (Survival)

A multiplayer sh'mup where you control your own battle tank! Duke it out in Battle or fight an alien robot army in Survival!

Controls:

Three different control styles available, including controllers.

Up / [W]: Forward

Down / [S]: Backward

Left & Right / [A] & [D]:  Steer

[Enter] / [Space] / (A): Shoot

[P]: Pause

[Esc] when paused: Quit game

[M]: Mute audio

[N]: Disable/Enable music

Credits: The entire game and its graphics made by me using Construct 3. Sound effects from "Essential Retro Game Sound Pack" by Juhani Junkala. The following music was used:

"Menu (Swimming Leningrad OST)" by TeraVex

"Masters Disciple" by TekNoTaku
